Key.English: Only one revive module can be used
*** WIP *** - Choose your language to be displayed in game for the revive text.
All players can revive only, no stabilize (default) -|- Medics can revive/stabilize -|- All players can revive/stabilize with medkits/firstaid kits.
Time it takes for an injured/unconscious player/AI unit to bleedout.
Allows the injured player/AI unit to be killed while unconscious via being shot/explosive damage/run over... you get the picture.
Allows the injured player/AI unit to be targeted by the enemy and killed while unconscious.
Allows playable AI units to be revived either in single/multiplayer scenarios.
Notify all players of teamkill related events.
The total number of revives allowed before actual death and being forced to respawn at base/respawn point.
Leave a damaged amount on the player/AI unit based on whether they are revived/stablized.
Allows the player to commit suicide and respawn back to their respawn_xxx marker for that faction/side (player only).
Allows a non injured player to drag an injured player/AI unit to a safe location before revive/stabilize.
Bullet/explosion effects for the player. (player only/experimental/WIP)
Places a marker on the map where the player/AI unit was last located and needs to be revived.
